overview.en: Velox Token is an ERC-20 compliant token that has been created as a utility to operate the upcoming VeloxBolt decentralized & anonymous exchange and trading platform. VLX can be minted, transacted and traded to serve the purpose as a utility token for the VeloxBolt decentralized exchange platform. Holders of VLX are awarded discounted fees on all velox products, 13% minting APR until the platform release and buy-backs to replace minting each quarter from the VeloxBolt platform & vNovum wallet profit.
overview.zh: Velox代币是一种符合ERC-20标准的代币，它用来在即将发布的去中心化及匿名交易平台VeloxBolt中作为平台币种。VLX能够被铸造、转账和交易，为VeloxBolt去中心化交易平台的主旨服务。 作为奖励，VLX的持有者享有Velox所有产品的折扣，并且在平台发布、每季度使用VeloxBolt平台和vNovum钱包的利润回购来取代铸造之前，持有者享有大约年化13%的铸币利率。
